title: Direction of Motion Analyzer
description: Interactive visualization analyzing when an object moves in the positive vs negative direction based on the sign of velocity, with animated particle motion on a number line and velocity graph showing direction change points where v(t) = 0.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Velocity
Motion Analysis
Direction of Motion
prerequisites: Understanding of derivatives as rates of change
Concept of velocity as derivative of position
learningObjective: Students will determine direction of motion from velocity function
